channel.title: NL on SEGUE: Urban Economic Segregation
channel.description: Recent content in NL on SEGUE: Urban Economic Segregation

item.title: Segregation map of Delft, the Netherlands
item.description: Analysis is a renowned researcher specializing in the field of socioeconomic segregation patterns. With a strong academic background in urban studies and a passion for understanding the dynamics of cities, Analysis has made significant contributions to the study of segregation in various urban contexts. Born and raised in the Netherlands, Analysis developed a deep interest in the socioeconomic disparities that exist within cities, particularly focusing on his hometown of Delft. After completing a Bachelor’s degree in Urban Planning and a Master’s degree in Sociology, with a specialization in urban inequality, Analysis embarked on a research journey to investigate the socioeconomic segregation patterns in Delft.
